About Me

I'm a Shippensburg University Graduate from Easton, Pennsylvania. I am currently working as a consultant for Fitch Ratings as an Information Security Analyst. I am hoping to become a full-time Web Developer. The technologies I am currently using are HTML, CSS, Javascript, and the Fetch API. I hope to keep learning new technologies in the future.
